title: House of the Wolf
description: The triumphant conclusion to the magnificent saga of an empire that spans the stars… Jael. The son of a thief, he became the servant of the highest destiny of all… Lady Adrien Eliseer. A woman of fragile beauty and tragic legacy, she hid behind a veil of secrets and carried the burden of an unspeakable dream. Alex Ransom. Once a Lord, he sacrificed everything vital to his life in order to save the Concord, and must now face the ultimate sacrifice . . .
author: M.K. Wren
